'''Smooth sandstone stairs''' are a [[smooth sandstone]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Smooth sandstone stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Smooth Sandstone Stairs
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
Smooth sandstone stairs generate as part of [[desert village]]s.
